comments.body: As above, you put the single `python setup.py` under a `script` tag here.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +13,17 @@
build:
  number: 0
  script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record=record.txt

comments.body: I guess this should be `[<py35]`, no?

Still figuring out how to do the stdout in postlink, but will reset build...

As for mock: will have to research... not sure when it was added to
stdlib...
